div.head: [Letter from John Watson to Young John Allen, September 27, 1883]
div.p:
In answer to your letter to Mr Thompson enquiring about the Kong. Pau. I have to say that of the 54 vol copies vol XV received
30 were distributed (gratis) to Mandarins in & around Amoy
6 are remain neither sold nor given away &
18 were sold. A Chinese book-seller got 20 cents commission on each copy.

I enclose a cheque for $14.40 the balance of $18 after
deducting $3.60 commission
I am sorry that we did not manage to sell more.

closer.signed:
John Watson
Sec. of Tract Society
